metadata.title: CVE-2022-47372 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in the Create event section inPandora FMS Console v766 and lower. An attacker typically exploits thisvulnerability by injecting XSS payloads on popular pages of a site orpassing a link to a victim, tricking them into viewing the page thatcontains the stored XSS payload.

criterions.comment: pandora: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
